transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, good afternoon Sandeep ji.
Executive: Ji, good afternoon ji.
Customer: Ha, kaise hai sir aap?
Executive: Badiya aap bataye.
Customer: Okay sir, mai bhi achi hu sir. Sir dekhiye waise to maine hazara asthai cheeze discuss kar li hai mam se aur matlab unke matlab system me maine ek auto fresh plus ek wo chrome download karaya unke usko setup karaya hai. Taki every 12 second me aapka jo matlab wo system hai wo khud se refresh hota rahega. Mujhe refresh wali byleads hongi wo ho jayega, thik hai?
Customer: Aur tester me bhi maine wo check karaya to ab hamare pass label machine ki aur matlab boom barrier ki byleads aa rahi hai. To last final matlab yahi discuss hua hai mera mam se. Kyuki sir aapka jo plan hai usme aapki 34 byleads aapko weekly milti hai, thik hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: To uske according hame five byleads daily consume karni hai weekly agar mai according karu to. Five byleads ke according to maine mam ko bataya ki wo unki baat thik hai ki wo byleads unko waha show ho rahi hai wo isliye ho raha tha ki wo refresh matlab kuch issue chal raha tha usme to wo maine wo download kara liya unke system me, thik hai? Aur five byleads ki baat aayi to five byleads hame daily mil jati hai jo hamare relevant hoti hai. To wo mam mujhse matlab unko maine thoda samjhaya ki panch se zyada hame daily basis pe consume karni hai aur hamara jo inquiries hai aur calls wo hame aa rahi hai, right sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To abhi I think abhi waise to mai sir daily basis pe usko khud se bhi check karti hu aur sir se bhi kara rahi hu to aisa koi issue nahi hai. To abhi to aap thoda matlab satisfied hai na matlab ye sab maine kara liya hai to aapne matlab confirm kiya mam se?
Customer: Actually abhi aapke ki vajah se thoda jaldi chale gaye. Hai na? Ha sorry. Chale gaye. Mai ek bar discuss karke mai ha kal ek bar baat kar lete hai isse na.
Executive: Achcha matlab mam wo hue hai.
Customer: Mam aaj office pe chale gaye the, ha ha.
Executive: Achcha achcha no issue. Sir maine mam se bola tha ki aap se confirm karne ke liye hamare jo 64 products hai jo inactive hai, thik hai? To inactive hai ab jitna matlab ki jo hamare usme maximum jo hamare products hai wo remote matlab glass door lock aur camera hai. To agar unme se koi aise products hai jisme hum aage deal karne hi nahi wale hai to unko delete kara dijiyega. Aur inki aur aur number ko to mai abhi kar deta hu to mai kar deta hu abhi delete. Ha.
Executive: Thik hai. To apni side se mai isko jo matlab ek feedback kyuki raise ho gaya tha aapki side se to usko mai apni side se close kara sakti hu na?
Customer: Mam isko kal karte hai close fir. Aap ek din ka aur time de do.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi aisa koi wo nahi hai matlab ye ek jaise ki aapne na customer care pe call kar diya tha. But wo aata hi hamare pass hai issue ki aapke client ko issue ho raha hai to uske is side se. To bas wahi feedback close karna hai us aise koi baat nahi hai ki mai aapki help nahi karungi isse work nahi karungi wo to mai sir aapko call karne continue to hoti hai.
Customer: Ha to wo bas aisa bas ye hai ki ek officially mail hota hai jo ki matlab mujhe close karna hai wo three days ke andar hame close karna hota hai but wo abhi tak hua nahi hai to.
Executive: Ha mai usko close karwa rahi hu and ha sir please ab mail pe aap revert kar dena.
Customer: Ha aur kuch jo bhi hai aap isko ek bar dekh lijiye then hum isko aage karate hai. Don't worry mai daily basis pe us pe khud se bhi work karti hu.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Thik hai sir?
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Okay sir, thank you so much. Have a good day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's 64 products are inactive.

- Wants to close feedback raised from their side.



Resolution:

- Executive refreshed customer's system.

- Agreed to close feedback after customer confirmation.

- Executive assured daily work on the customer's account.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will revert on the mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inactive products, buyleads, feedback, system refresh
